Name: Witchcraft: Pandoras Box
About the game: In this fantastic Hidden Object Adventure, the Crow-Witch has seized this world and has kidnapped your daughter with the help of Pandoras Box. Travel into a parallel world where extraordinary and magical creatures await you and your task is simple... survive! Explore and uncover the magic that resides within and defeat the Witch to end her cruel tyranny. Will you manage to avoid the traps and other stuff she puts in your way and save your daughter?
